title: Option to clear default apps
content:
I need to clear the default application so that my phone asks me which application I want to use every time.

The option to clear defaults is gone and is not searchable in Android settings. 

This issue makes the help article addressing this specific problem obsolete. 

https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6271667

The aforementioned help article does not help, to restate.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
